Maintenance Made Simple- Airwork New Zealand's Hourly Support Plan
Airwork New Zealand's LTS101 hourly support plan takes the hassle out of maintaining your BK117 or AS350 aircraft. As a Honeywell Authorized Service Centre, Airwork provides a wide range of support plans that are tailored to suit operator needs.
- Comprehensive fixed hourly rate plans based on the number of monthly flight hours - An extensive pool of rental components with door-to-door pickup and delivery service (***some exclusions apply)
- An OEM Test Cell that ensures your engine leaves the workshop in the best possible condition
- One of the most comprehensive helicopter maintenance, repair and overhaul facilities in the world
To learn more about solutions for your future and ongoing maintenance requirements, visit Airwork New Zealand at HELI-EXPO 2017 booth #2220 to speak with Stephen Green <[[mailto:stephen.green@airwork.co.nz]]> or Keir Brown <[[mailto:keir.brown@airwork.co.nz]]>. You can also visit the Honeywell booth #5423 to speak with Derek Lockett <[[mailto:derek.lockett@honeywell.com]]>.
